Module com.example.demo

Package com.example.demo.gameElements.Utilities

package com.example.demo.gameElements.Utilities
package contains classes that are used within the game that are for checking the states of the game. also contains classes for the code for the movement for the cells. Classes in this package are key for decision-making within the other classes.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.example.demo.gameElements
    package that holds all the relevant elements used in the game scene including the game scene itself.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    generalMovement
    Class acts as a general blueprint and foundation for movement based interactions throughout the game.
    stateChecker
    The class is concerned with the operations that happens within the game, more specifically it determines the state the game is in at the time that any of the method from within the class is called.
    tileChecker
    The Class "tileChecker" has the distinct responsibility of conducting where the cells should go and if the cell moving in a certain direction are eligible for a merge operation.
    tileMovement
    The Class is a specialised version and inheritor of the generalMovement class.
